traits.name: Archer's Eye
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the archer can add 1d10 to its next attack or damage roll with a longbow or shortbow.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The archer makes two attacks with its longbow.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft, one target. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) piercing damage.
